question: What was Neelakanta Rao Jagdale famous for?
option1: Chairman and Managing Director of Vijaya Bank
option2: Chairman and Managing Director of Prestige Estates Projects Ltd.
option3: Chairman and Managing Director of Corporation Bank
option4: Chairman and Managing Director of Amrut Distilleries
answer: Chairman and Managing Director of Amrut Distilleries
explanation: Neelakanta Rao Jagdale was the Chairman and Managing Director of Amrut Distilleries. Amrut Distilleries is the producer of the Amrut Fusion Single Malt Whisky which ranked as the third finest whisky in the world by Jim Murray in his Whisky Bible. The brand continues to figure among the best whiskies in the world.
